mapper.select: select drugs.dno,dname,dunit,odnumber,dclassify,odtime,odtype,oremark,doperator from outware,drugs where outware.dno = drugs.dno and drugs.dno = #{dno} and odtime = #{odtime};
select id,drugs.dno,dname,dunit,odnumber,dclassify,odtime,odtype,oremark,doperator from outware,drugs where outware.dno = drugs.dno;
mapper.update: update drugs set dnumber = dnumber-#{odnumber} where drugs.dno = #{dno};
update inware set odnumber=#{odnumber},odtype=#{odtype},oremark=#{oremark},doperator=#{doperator} where dno = #{dno} and odtime = #{odtime};
